titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: A very long tiresome day, unrelieved until Ella came in the afternoon, bringing me some money, a number of kind letters from the clergy & others, and some books. I am assured by the nurses that I proceed excellently, so I must reconcile myself to the inevitable boredom as best I may!
